comments.body: To be consistent with `[Barrier]` and `[Cached]`, it would be better to capitalize them.
Thanks for the suggestion. Changed to capitalized ones.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +259,263 @@      case DeterministicLevel.INDETERMINATE => " [Indeterminate]"
      case DeterministicLevel.UNORDERED => " [Unordered]"
    }
    val escapedCallsite = Utility.escape(node.callsite)
    val label = s"${node.name} [${node.id}]$isCached$isBarrier$outputDeterministicLevel" +
